info.name: Transaction Monitoring and Travel Rule
info.description:
This collection provides ready-to-use API requests for **Transaction Monitoring** and **Travel Rule** products, helping you test and integrate them quickly.

In this collection, \`txnId\` and \`externalUserId\` are generated automatically for creating new transactions and applicants respectively. Â 

If you need to use your own values, please specify them directly in the request bodies.

body.raw:
{"applicantId":"{{applicantId}}","data":{"txnId": "{{txnId}}_1","txnDate": "2025-04-04 13:50:00+0100","zoneId": "UTC+01:00","type": "finance","info": {"direction": "in","amount": 10,"currencyCode": "STG","currencyType": "crypto","paymentDetails": "InfoDetails","paymentTxnId": "txnHash","type": "customType","cryptoParams": {"cryptoChain": "ETH"}},"applicant": {"type": "individual","fullName": "Users Fullname","placeOfBirth": "settlementName","dob": "1995-09-30","address": {"country": "CAN","postCode": "123456","town": "usersAddressTown","state": "usersAddState","street": "usersAddSt","subStreet": "usersAddSbSt","flatNumber": "101","buildingNumber": "202","buildingName": "usersAddBuildName","formattedAddress": "postCode, town, state, street, buildingNumber"},"institutionInfo": {"address": {"country": "PRT"},"code": "BIC","name": "Wells Fargo","internalId": "vaspInternalId"},"paymentMethod": {"type": "crypto","accountId": "XX00123456789012345678","issuingCountry": "CAN"},"device": {"ipInfo": {"lat": 300,"lon": 500,"ip": "178.123.68.138","countryCode3": "POL"},"userAgent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_2) AppleWebKit/601.3.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/9.0.2 Safari/601.3.9","sessionId": "r-v3-812412m9e12d42","sessionAgeMs": 18,"acceptLang": "en","fingerprint": "usersDeviceFing"}},"counterparty": {"type": "individual","externalUserId": "cpExtId","fullName": "CP Name", "placeOfBirth": "settlementName","dob": "1995-09-30","address": {"country": "QAT","postCode": "987654","town": "cpTown","state": "cpState","street": "cpStreet","subStreet": "cpSubStreet","flatNumber": "303","buildingNumber": "404","buildingName": "cpBuildingName","formattedAddress": "postCode, town, state, street, buildingNumber"},"institutionInfo": {"address": {"country": "PAN"},"code": "BIC","name": "Wells Fargo","internalId": "vaspInternalId"},"paymentMethod": {"type": "crypto","accountId": "cpWalletAddress","issuingCountry": "SVN"}, "device": {"ipInfo": {"lat": 600,"lon": 700,"ip": "62.228.108.249","countryCode3": "SJM"},"userAgent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_2) AppleWebKit/601.3.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/9.0.2 Safari/601.3.9","sessionId": "r-v3-812412m9e12d42","sessionAgeMs": 18,"acceptLang": "en","fingerprint": "cpDevFing"}},"props": {"customProperty": "Custom value","dailyOutLimit": "10000"}}}
{"data":{"txnId": "{{txnId}}_2","zoneId": "UTC+01:00","type": "finance","info": {"type": "withdrawal","direction": "out","amount": 2,"currencyCode": "BTC","currencyType": "crypto","amountInDefaultCurrency": 95238.09523809524,"defaultCurrencyCode": "EUR","paymentDetails": "Birthday Present"},"applicant": {"type": "individual","externalUserId": "{{externalUserId}}_2","fullName": "John Smith","placeOfBirth": "settlementName","dob": "1995-09-30","paymentMethod": {"type": "crypto"}},"counterparty": {"type": "individual","externalUserId": "peanbpa9x4bgptzkrzr3qt","fullName": "Jack Posek","placeOfBirth": "settlementName","dob": "1995-09-30","paymentMethod": {"type": "crypto","accountId": "1EM4e8eu2S2RQrbS8C6aYnunWpkAwQ8GtG"}},"props": {"customProperty": "Custom value","dailyOutLimit": "10000"}}}

item.name: Initiate SDK for Travel Rule transaction
Patch transaction with chain transaction ID

exec: throw new Error('Signing formData is not possible via Postman scripts');
